  16. ‌let auto_include find_in_dir fn =
  17.   if !Clflags.no_std_include then
  18.     raise Not_found
  19.   else
  20.     let alert = Location.auto_include_alert in
  21.     Load_path.auto_include_otherlibs alert find_in_dir fn

  23. (* Initialize the search path.
  24.    [dir] (default: the current directory)
  25.    is always searched first  unless -nocwd is specified,
  26.    then the directories specified with the -I option (in command-line order),
  27.    then the standard library directory (unless the -nostdlib option is given).
  28. *)

  30. ‌let init_path ?(auto_include=auto_include) ?(dir="") () =
  31.   let dirs =
  32.     if !Clflags.use_threads then "+threads" :: !Clflags.include_dirs
  33.     else
  34.       !Clflags.include_dirs
  35.   in
  36. ‌  let dirs =
  37.     !Compenv.last_include_dirs @ dirs @ Config.flexdll_dirs @
  38.     !Compenv.first_include_dirs
  39.   in
  40. ‌  let exp_dirs =
  41.     List.map (Misc.expand_directory Config.standard_library) dirs
  42.   in
  43. ‌  let dirs =
  44.     (if !Clflags.no_cwd then [] else [dir])
  45.     @ List.rev_append exp_dirs (Clflags.std_include_dir ())
  46.   in
  47.   Load_path.init ~auto_include dirs;
  48.   Env.reset_cache ()

  50. (* Return the initial environment in which compilation proceeds. *)

  52. (* Note: do not do init_path() in initial_env, this breaks
  53.    toplevel initialization (PR#8227) *)

  55. ‌let initial_env () =
  56.   Ident.reinit();
  57.   Types.Uid.reinit();
  58.   let initially_opened_module =
  59.     if !Clflags.nopervasives then
  60.       None
  61.     else
  62.       Some "Stdlib"
  63.   in
  64.   Typemod.initial_env
  65.     ~loc:(Location.in_file "command line")
  66.     ~initially_opened_module
  67.     ~open_implicit_modules:(List.rev !Clflags.open_modules)

  69. ‌let set_from_env flag Clflags.{ parse; usage; env_var } =
  70.   try
  71.     match parse (Sys.getenv env_var) with
  72.     | None ->
  73.         Location.prerr_warning Location.none
  74.           (Warnings.Bad_env_variable (env_var, usage))
  75.     | Some x -> match !flag with
  76.       | None -> flag := Some x
  77.       | Some _ -> ()
  78.   with
  79.     Not_found -> ()

  81. ‌let read_clflags_from_env () =
  82.   set_from_env Clflags.color Clflags.color_reader;
  83.   if
  84.     Option.is_none !Clflags.color &&
  85.     Option.is_some (Sys.getenv_opt "NO_COLOR")
  86.   then
  87.     Clflags.color := Some Misc.Color.Never;
  88.   set_from_env Clflags.error_style Clflags.error_style_reader;
  89.   ()

  91. ‌let rec make_directory dir =
  92.   if Sys.file_exists dir then () else
  93.     begin
  94.       make_directory (Filename.dirname dir);
  95.       Sys.mkdir dir 0o777
  96.     end

  98. let with_ppf_dump ~file_prefix f =
  99.   let with_ch ch =
  100.     let ppf = Format.formatter_of_out_channel ch in
  101.     ppf,
  102.     (fun () ->
  103.        Format.pp_print_flush ppf ();
  104.        close_out ch)
  105.   in
  106.   let ppf_dump, finally =
  107.     match !Clflags.dump_dir, !Clflags.dump_into_file with
  108.     | None, false -> Format.err_formatter, ignore
  109.     | None, true -> with_ch (open_out (file_prefix ^ ".dump"))
  110.     | Some d, _ ->
  111.         let () = make_directory Filename.(dirname @@ concat d @@ file_prefix) in
  112.         let _, ch =
  113.           Filename.open_temp_file ~temp_dir:d (file_prefix ^ ".")  ".dump"
  114.         in
  115.         with_ch ch

  117.   in
  118.   Misc.try_finally (fun () -> f ppf_dump) ~always:finally
